home.foundationDescription: The core principles that guide our mission and drive our commitment to serving DHL employees.
home.visionText: Building a strong union that represents all employees with justice and transparency, advocates for their rights, and promotes a stable, fair, and innovative work environment.
home.missionText: Representing members professionally, protecting their gains, empowering them with knowledge and support, and building bridges of cooperation with management to achieve fair and sustainable solutions.
home.objective1: Provide legal and professional support to members
home.objective2: Raise awareness of labor rights and duties
home.objective4: Launch initiatives and programs (social, sports, awareness)
home.objective5: Ensure transparency and accountability in union work
home.objective6: Develop effective communication channels with members
